reviewText: All i can say is that these video clips are very clear despite they were recorded over 30 years ago, and there's an introduction of  the artist's history in the making of every video, before they start, my favorite ones here are " You Could Have Been With Me" by Sheena Easton and " Heartbreaker" by Pat Benatar, this is a total collector's item,, can be easily transfered to dvd, good luck!
WHY are the artists names presented with spelling mistakes? What an insult! SUZI QUATRO and SHEENA EASTON are the artist's names and correct spelling - not as shown in the Product Details box.
This is a great little video that has some cool videos. Worth it just for the great Suzy Quattro video. nice look back to the 80's!
